feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 110 to 150 mm of rain. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h about hills and ranges. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Watch upgraded to an Orange Warning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 140 to 180 mm of rain, especially about eastern Wairarapa and the Tararua Range. Intensities of 20 to 25 mm per hour about the hills and ranges, especially overnight Sunday to Monday. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Eastern hills of Wellington added to warning area and rainfall totals increased.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Note, the eastern hills of Wellington has been upgraded to an Orange Warning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: High.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale south to southwesterlies with damaging gusts of 130 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: South to southwest winds may approach severe gale force in exposed places, especially about and south of the Wairau Valley. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 120 to 170 mm of rain. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h Sunday night and Monday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been increased to Moderate. Rainfall totals increased.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: South to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, Taihape about and east of State Highway 1 has been upgraded to an Orange Warning. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 120 to 160 mm of rain. Intensities of 20 to 30 mm per hour are possible, especially overnight Sunday to Monday. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Rainfall totals increased.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale west to southwesterlies with damaging gusts of 130 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: Warning area extended to include Taihape about and east of State Highway 1.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale southwesterlies with damaging gusts of 130 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been increased to Moderate. Gust speed increased.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 150 mm of rain on top of what has already accumulated. Peak intensities of 20 to 30 mm per hour tonight and Monday morning. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Timing for onset of heavy rain delayed.
